room_title: Escape room "Mystery In Paris" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Had a fun time with my friends and our game master Andrew provided a welcoming and helpful experience on our the Paris mission; would come again to try Heist

room_title: Escape room "Mystery In Paris" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: We had an amazing time at amazing escape. After we finished Paris we went right into another room which was heist. We went with four adults and 3 children and all had so much fun! JOHN and Kat was amazing ! So much fun

room_title: Escape room "Mystery In Paris" by Amazing Escape Room in New York
review: Amazing experience we did the room “Paris” and Kat was our game master. The clues were great. The room was well put together, the visual effects were good. All around good experience. I Recommend this place to anyone who wants to have a fun time, the room is not super difficult. Good for beginners.
